pp2.2:3.3: makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ → makkhīyanā makkhīyitattā (si); makkhiyanā makkhiyitattaṃ (mr)
pp2.2:5.3: issāyitattaṃ usūyā usūyanā → ussuyā ussuyanā (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:16.3: asaṅgāhaṇā apariyogāhaṇā → asaṅgāhanā apariyogāhanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:18.3: sukatadukkaṭānaṃ → sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ (bj, sya-all) | sammaggatā → samaggatā (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:46.3: tappetā ca → ayaṃ vuccati puggalo titto (bj); appetā ca (pts-vp-pli1)
